title: GetWeeklyEntryCount (Method)
text:
METHOD GetWeeklyEntryCount : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the number of weekly entries for a specific day dayOfWeek in the Weekly_Schedule-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: dayOfWeek
rows.Comment:
The day of the week for which the entry count shall be
determined.

rows.Name: count
rows.Comment:
The number of entries for the specified week day after
calling this method.
